name: Name
gamify: We manage through gamification everything our students learn
projectclasses: All our classes and projects separated for better management
behaviours: We can assess positive and negative behaviors
randomdescription: Random choice of elements to create surprise
MyClassGame: Turn your class into an adventure where your students become the protagonists through the game. Make learning fun again with @MyClassGame.
PremioEspiral: The Espiral Association convenes this contest aimed at professionals in the field of education. @MyClassGame has been a finalist in Trends in Adult Practice-University.
GPLv3: @MyClassGame is an open source project with a GPL v3 license that aims to grow through the collaboration of teachers interested in its development.
github: @MyClassGame is an open source project where you can consult its code on the GitHub page to be able to cooperatively develop and improve it.
YouTube: In this YouTube Channel we are gradually incorporating simple video tutorials where the operation of @MyClassGame is explained and how to use it in your classes to turn them into a game.
Twitter: Follow us on Twitter to be informed of all the news and improvements that are being made in @MyClassGame as well as to share your experiences and contribute ideas.
Telegram: Follow us on Telegram to be informed of all the news and improvements that are being made in @MyClassGame as well as to share your experiences and contribute ideas with other members.
Facebook: Follow us on Facebook to be informed of all the news and improvements that are being made in @MyClassGame as well as to share your experiences and contribute ideas with other members.
intro1: is a web application that aims to help any teacher to introduce new methodologies in their classes easily and intuitively
intro2: The idea is that Gamified Cooperative Projects (GCP) can be created through the platform and in this way manage all the relevant data to have a follow-up of each task carried out by the students
intro3: Currently the platform is in continuous development so we are open to any idea and suggestion
intro4: If you like to share on your social networks you can use
askingCollaboration: Would you like to collaborate with the development of @MyClassGame?
ifStudentCode: If you are an student with code
allStudentsXP: Increase XP to all selected students
allStudentsHP: Decrease HP to all selected students
allStudentsBG: Add badges to all selected students
allPowersCollections: Add powers or collectable to all selected students
teamXP: Increase XP to all team members
teamsHP: Decrease XP to all team members
